message.body: Hey what's the price of Ryans two cakes if you deliver them tomorrow? My mom is gonna pay for the cake.
What's the latest you can drop the cake off? And does it have to be kept in the fridge?
Either before 8:00 or after 10:00.. and yea refrigerated
I'm thinking maybe after 10. I have cooking and setting up to do and I need to clear out the fridge for it to fit.
Ok that's fine I have something from 8-10 tonight so can grab it once im home and then drop it off real quick
Awesome thank you! My apartment looks like it threw up bubble guppies haha
If you aren't busy you girls are more then welcome to stop by and have some food and wine.
Thanks you but we have work at 8 am tomorrow
